description: Yuna Revelation is a programmable BRC2.0 pixel collection powered by EVM-compatible smart contracts & inscribed under the 100M inscription for provenance like none other. Holders of Yuna Revelation will get a BRC2.0 token airdrop once BRC2.0 mainnet launch goes live on Block 912,690 (~September 2). The ticker is $[REDACTED]
name: Yuna Revelation BRC2.0
